name: Flaming Shot
description:
The theme for this game was for a Weekly Game Jam: Tennis.

You are put in an area where you have to brawl in a game that is in the form of tennis. Your goal is to destroy each others bricks within the given amount of minutes. Whoever destroys the most bricks OR falls off their platform loses!

All of the programming, pixel art, music, animations and sound effects were done by me!

Font used: 8 - bit arcade by Damien Gosset

Controls:

P - Return to menu

Player 1:

A - Move left

D - Move right

W - Charge jump meter

Q: Charge hit meter

Player 2:

Left Arrow - Move left

Right Arrow - Move right

Up Arrow - Charge jump meter

M: Charge hit meter

Tip: If you hold the hit meter long enough, you will activate your "Ballistic shooting", which causes the fireball to move in a randomized direction. Be careful though, this ability is neither friend nor foe!

Let me know what you think of the game if you checked it out please! I would love to hear feedback :D
